mapper.select: SELECT code, location, gallery, title, summary, thumnail, product_info, start_date, end_date, hit, sales FROM EXHIBITION_TB WHERE code = #{exhibitionCode}
select * from EXHIBITION_TB where title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select count(*) from EXHIBITION_TB where title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
select * from EXHIBITION_TB where (#{searchDate} between START_DATE and END_DATE)
select count(*) from EXHIBITION_TB where (#{searchDate} between START_DATE and END_DATE)
